history.text: Hi
Hello
We are talking about the movie Bruce Almighty. Have you seen it?
I don't think so
it's about a tv reporter who is down on his luck and complains to God.
they guy is mad at God for not doing a better job, so God offers to let the guy try being God for a week.
What do you think?
Sounds like it's a good movie
who stars in it
Jim Carrey plays the guy Bruce Nolan and Morgan Freeman plays God.
I love Jim Carrey
he has some really hilarious slapstick scenes in this movie.
It came out in 2003.
Wow so it's been out for a while.  Don't know how I missed that
Jennifer Aniston plays the guy's girl friend and Steve Carell is his rival at the TV station.
Some great actors are in this movie
Catherine Bell is in it as well.
I think I remember who she is.  I need to watch this movie
I don't know her either, but with all of these great actors I would have expected higher ratings. Rotten Tomatoes only gave it a 48% review with an average of 5.7 out of 10.

There are some really clever scenes. Like when Bruce discovers the body of Jimmy Hoffa and covers the story i
n order to get his job back.
Rotten Tomatoes gets it wrong quite often.  I usually just make up my own mind.
That's a good way to do it too.
There is another scene where Bruce creates an email system to handle all of the prayers that God receives, and he sets it up to answer Yes to every prayer.
Ha ha.  That's awesome.  If only that could really happen
He is also trying to sabotage his coworker Evan in order to a promotion over Evan.
How is he trying to sabotage him.
He does some different things to humiliate him on the set during a tv interview that cause Evan to get fired.
The relationship with the Jennifer Aniston character is pretty important too. God challenges Bruce ot pray for what he truly wants
I'm sure it's funny though.  Jim Carrey is great
There are some philosophical messages in this film too that make it more complex than the usual comedy.
Bruce has some fun using his power to cause miraculous events.
That's interesting especially for a JC movie
The relationship between him and the Aniston character is rocky for awhile too, and Bruce prays that she finds a man that would really make her happy. That lands him in the hospital.
(Sorry to spoil the whole plot for you.)
That's okay.  I hope I get to watch it soon.
The critics were kind of harsh saying that Bruce Almighty is funny but it gets slowed down by being so sappy.
That does bother me.  If it's funny, I like it to remain funny
They compared the Bruce character aspiring to be a big time news anchor with Jim Carry aspiring to be a "real" actor. Ouch.
Oh geez...guess they were wrong
heh... yea... he does alright. Anyone who can co-star with Morgan Freeman is doing alright.

uid2response.feedback: The other person made the movie sound interesting.
